```{r setup}
library(econWeb)
```

## Step 1

Select the UI frame to export then right click to choose **Copy/Paste as** > **Copy as CSS**

## Step 2

In R
```{r}
fig <- Fig()
```

## Step 3

Adjust frame inner text/html

```{r}
fig$split_innerText$`card-content-word-title`="Trick"
fig$split_innerText$`card-content-word-pronun`="US /trɪk/       US /trɪk/"
fig$split_innerText$`card-content-word-explain`="adj. 虛弱的；欺詐的
n. 戲法；竅門；訣竅；把戲；特技"
fig$split_innerText$`card-content-teacher-word`="前往VoiceTube 聽 Leila 老師如何應用單字"
fig$split_innerText$`card-content-btn-level`="A2 初級"
fig$update_div()
```

```{r}
fig$split_css$`card-content-teacher-word`$remain$width <- "min-content"
fig$update_css()
```

```{r}
fig$ui() |> browseTag2()
```
